Gangon ran forward in front of Hell Beast and blasted the shells with his
machine gun....able to get them all because of about 1,000,000
bullets!....he was trying to protect Hell Beast and BrightBlade at the same
time and was trying his best....and he was succeding!....he waited to see
what the shots would do........
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 6:20 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:
>
>
> ::Ramhorn and Stinkbomb both said "_____ maximize!" in unison,
transforming
> to their robot modes::
>
> ::Stinkbomb looked to Ramhorn and nodded, taking out his 'tail' rifle,
firing
> off a thick cloud that traveled like a laser bolt at Hell Beast, the gas
> being a paralyzing chemical that leaves a revolting and utterly nasty odor
> for weeks, unless you bathe in something, but to tell you would ruin the
fun::
>
> ::Ramhorn made a disgusted expression on his face:: "I feel sorry for Hell
> Beast." (Firing off a continuous blasts of sonic shells at the Predacon
> leader, about 25 shells in all)
